name: Muso-ka
description:
The Game

Experience the world of Muso-ka, a third-person 3D adventure game set in a dream of a Japanese boy.

Explore, collect and learn about Japanese culture/history while progressing throughout the game but make sure you avoid the powerful lights! ^^

Hope you enjoy it!

Controls

WASD - Movement

Space - Jump

E - Interact

Mouse - Look around

Escape - Pause/Settings

Development

This game was developed for my final year project at London South Bank University. A special thanks to Yoan Alibert, Aggelos Mpalatsoukas and Aleksandar Todorov for their help and support in coding, music and 2D art.
